description:
Available in: English

Does NOT stream/play internet radio or music.

Turn the Dial Digital Edition is the big brother to Turn the Dial Radio Directory, and is meant as an offline directory of traditional over-the-air radio stations. If you find yourself traveling in an unfamiliar city in the U.S. or Canada and want to listen to local radio then this is your helper app. Find your preferred genre of station and go straight to it, no scanning and hoping advertisements don't lead you right past it. 

Features:
+100 U.S. cities
+25 Canadian cities
+U.S. cities list best available frequencies for FM transmitters
+Satellite radio channels for U.S. 
+Listing of powerful "Class A" AM stations
+Common format definitions
+All data stored in app, no internet connection required

Clean, easy to read interface with quick, smooth lists you blaze through to find what you want. Turn the Dial DE will continue to grow, with radio station information for Mexico, U.K., Australia, and other countries in our sites and already being worked on. Great for any traveler.
